categories: Cap Cool Trail Bike Henley Short Sleeve Shirt
description:
This high-performer has a casual look, but the technical function to take you through mixed weather and span micro-climates. The quick drying knit fabric has moisture wicking properties to keep you dry and comfortable on or off the bike.Made of quick dry, moisture-wicking polyester that doesn't get sticky in the heat.HeiQ antimicrobial treatment keeps the fabric fresh and odour-free.Articulated seams and longer back hem designed for the ride position.Regular fit feels like a great tee should.
